question: A motor-cyclist moving towards a huge cliff with a speed of <katex>$18~kmh^{-1}$</katex>, blows a horn of source frequency 325 Hz. If the speed of the sound in air is <katex>$330~ms^{-1}$</katex>, the number of beats heard by him is
explanation: Beat frequency <katex>$= f' - f_0 = f_0 (\frac{v+v_s}{v-v_s} - 1) = f_0 \frac{2v_s}{v-v_s}$</katex>.
